column4: how can I configure firefox/totem to play the video links on the bbc? For example at news.bbc.co.uk "MDC claims election win" just open the video playing window but doesn't play it
I don't mind using mplayer if that is easier to set up
BBC puts roadblocks if you want to use anything other than Windows, you have to install User Agent Switcher in Firefox and switch to Netscape/Windows and it works
